name: Datadog
description: Engineer building the Incident Management product! Code monkey, on call engineer, whatever it takes to increase shareholder value

name: Goldman Sachs
description: Worked as a Technology Summer Analyst within the Controllers team

name: Intuit
description: Software engineer, developing in Java (Spring) and Go. Work included building an API in Go that outputs metadata on metrics and developing the infrastructure (K8 cluster). Additionally, I built a filter for certain metrics in the QBO Java monolith and created an abstraction using AOP to decrease amount of code.

name: BusRight
description: Worked as a backend engineer, using JavaScript/TypeScript to build out features for a small startup. Projects included setting up persistent notifications, creating a password reset process, and beginning the conversion from JS to TS.

name: Sandbox
description: Member of a software consultancy that develops for researchers and the Northeastern community. In the past, I worked on the SearchNEU team, participating in projects such as a DB migration and creating React components to improve search filtering on the front-end.

name: HackBeanpot
description: Organizer for an annual Boston-based hackathon. Currently working in a Sponsorship x Tech role, where I have built an interactive sponsorship packet and a judging scheduler, both using React. In the past, as a member of the Sponsorship team, we raised $20,000. Also, currently leading the Project Logistics team and led the Judging team last year.
